animeTitle: I Have A Little Too Much Nascent Souls
otherNames: I Have A Little Too Much Nascent Souls, 我的元婴有点多, Wo You Yuan Ying NB Zheng, I Have Fundamental Infant NB Syndrome, I have a Bad-ass Syndrome, 我有元婴NB症
synopsis: I am a loose cultivator in the Nascent Soul stage, but the number of Nascent Souls is a little more than 100 million… When did I become the ruthless man as the No. 1 cultivator and the wealthiest in the cultivation world? ? ?
